DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate lipid uptake , wet characteristic , visual performance AIR OPTIX® AQUA ACUVUE® OASYS® HYDRACLEAR® contact lens use conjunction two contact lens care system .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative In-Vivo Wetting Characteristics Silicone Hydrogel Materials With Selected Lens Care Systems
DOC.detailed_description: This study divide two phase . In Pre-Investigational Phase ( Phase 1 ) , participant wear PureVision contact lenses 30 day use ReNu® Multiplus® contact lens care . Eligible participant continue Investigational Phase ( Phase 2 ) randomly assign wear AIR OPTIX® AQUA contact lenses ACUVUE® OASYS® HYDRACLEAR® contact lenses total two month . For contact lens care , participant use OPTI-FREE® PUREMOIST® MPDS BIOTRUE® 30 day .
DOC.criteria: Read understand Participant Information Sheet ; Read , sign , date Informed Consent ; Be current silicone hydrogel contact lens wearer use contact lens frequent replacement ( biweekly monthly ) daily wear modality ; Be classify symptomatic depositor end replacement period accord protocolspecified criterion ; Agree wear study contact lenses direct duration study maintain appointment schedule ; Best correct visual acuity 6/9 good eye ; Normal eye exception need visual correction ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Known sensitivity intolerance contact lenses contact lens care product use ; Monocular vision ( one eye functional vision one eye fit contact lens ) ; Use systemic medication might interfere contact lens wear produce dry eye side effect ; Systemic disease might interfere contact lens wear produce dry eye side effect ; Systemic ocular allergy might interfere contact lens wear ; Ocular disease might interfere contact lens wear ; Active ocular infection ; Use concomitant topical ocular medication study period ; Previous ocular surgery ; Pregnant , plan become pregnant , lactating time enrollment ; Participation investigational drug device study within 30 day enter study ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
